author: dkhaywood
msg: XAT2 now compiling against reflector redesign; removed M2_REPO stuff from Java build path for the XAT projects: using OSGi manifest (as per everything else)

author: dkhaywood
msg: added getFacets(Facet.Filter ff); added ImperativeFacet (declares a facet is a wrapper around a Method); reinstated JavaSpecification#getMember(Method) for benefit of XAT2; renamed the *Method facets in the Java reflector to be *MethodFacet.
